## Intoduction

This is my first R package, created for Advanced R programming course at CZU in Prague.
All created functions are based on topics, that we had during the course.
Data table and Spatial data were covered during this course

## Instalation
 
```{r eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("https://github.com/richardrex/advanced.r.stuff.git")
```
